lessonPlans.title: Introduction to Pixel Art
lessonPlans.content: In this lesson, you will be introduced to the basics of pixel art and learn how to create simple pixel art designs.

steps.description: Understand the concept of pixel art and its applications.
tools: Graphics software such as Photoshop or GIMP
Pixel art tools like Piskel or Aseprite

steps.description: Learn about different pixel art techniques and styles.
resources: Pixel Art Styles: Retro vs. Modern

steps.description: Practice sketching simple pixel art designs on grid paper.

exercises.description: Create a pixel art character using basic shapes and colors.
Recreate a classic video game sprite using pixel art techniques.

lessonPlans.title: Advanced Pixel Art Techniques
lessonPlans.content: In this lesson, you will learn more advanced techniques to enhance your pixel art skills and create more complex designs.

steps.description: Explore dithering and anti-aliasing techniques in pixel art.
Learn about color theory and its application in pixel art.
resources: Choosing a Color Palette for Pixel Art

steps.description: Experiment with animation and create animated pixel art sprites.

exercises.description: Design and animate a pixel art scene with parallax scrolling effect.
Create a pixel art logo with a limited color palette and dithering.

lessonPlans.title: Creating Pixel Art Assets
lessonPlans.content: In this lesson, you will learn how to create pixel art assets for games or other digital projects.

steps.description: Understand the requirements and limitations of pixel art assets in different digital platforms.
resources: Pixel Art Asset Guidelines for Games

steps.description: Study different types of pixel art assets like characters, objects, and backgrounds.
Practice creating pixel art assets for a specific project.
tools: Graphics software like Photoshop or GIMP

exercises.description: Design and create pixel art assets for a platformer game.
Create pixel art backgrounds and tilesets for a top-down RPG game.
